message:
Over 500 activists gathered at the Iowa Statehouse in Des Moines to show solidarity with the protesters in Wisconsin and rally against legislation that would limit state workers' bargaining rights.

‎"Legislation introduced to the Iowa House would prevent public workers from negotiating health benefits with their employers & also decrease their pensions."

http://www.rawstory.com/rs/2011/02/22/hundreds-rally-at-iowa-capitol-over-labor-laws/
